div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xij die
februarij anno quo supra

the saide d day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' William
blinsele forspekar that Dauid gichtane is avande to Alexander ranison'
vij oxin' hidis and ij ky hidis

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Williame blinsele forspekar that Jonhne Scherar' is quyt of
ane corff follouit be Johne mar' procurator to John blabir' as
It was follouit and askit

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvto die
februarij anno quo supra

the saide day Androw Waus oblist him be his hande vphaldin to content
and pay or ger' be pait xxtj s' Scottis money to Jonhne Retre
at pasche next to Cum for thre termes annuell aucht to him of
the lande pertening to vmquhile sere alexander vocat

The saide day Jonhne Stevin lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht
comperit to a

div.head: Artifices vten' arte sua et mercancia
div.p:
Andreas litstar et Andreas lousone carnifex posuerunt
se In voluntate prepositj et burgi pro occupacione artis sue et mercancie

The saide day the balyeis assignit friday that next cumis to
megann of bacrome to pay x s' arrestit in hir' handis
to Alexander horne or ellis bring normond' malcome of leslie the said day
to ansuer' to the said Alexander

Eodem die Richardus Waus deuenit plegius legalis quod thomas
mar' erit Indempnis pro Willelmo Wormet et parte sua aliter quam
per viam Juris Et Johannes Retre erit deueuit plegius legalis
quo dictus Willelmus erit Indempnis pro dicto thoma et parte sua
aliter quam per viam Juris

add.foreign: consensus consulum et mercatorum preposito ad ministrandum Justiciam secundum formam Juris et cetera

div.p:
the saide day thir personis vndir writin of the Consale and nichbouris
of this tone Alexander menyeis Robert blinsel Jonhne Cullane Jonhne
Colisone William gareache eldar Dauid mathesone William portar
James Colisone Jonhne blak Androw murray eldar Johne thomsone
Donald Srathachin patrik leslie William futhes William Kintor
Jonhne grig Alexander nachtj george bisset William nichilsone William
andirsone eldar William murray thomas chapman Dauid fynne
Alexander hay Jonhne of murray and William gray consentit that the aldirman
minister Justice one the craftismen with fauoris be sicht and auisment
of the consall eftir the forme of our Souerane lordis lavis And gif
the aldirman excedis the ordour' of our Souerane lordis lavis but with fauoris
and by thar' consale thai disassent tharto and Renuncis that doingis And
herapone the said Androw murray askit Instrument witnes philp Dunbrek
and Androw nachtj sergeandis

The said day the aldirman grantit and consentit to minister Justice apon
the craftismen with fauoris be the auisment of the consale eftir the tenor
of our Souerane lordis lavis and with avis' of the merchandmen
and to ger' warne thame to cum to se Justice ministerit et cetera
xxij Augustj anno Dominj Millesimo iiijC lxxxxviijo

1 It is avisit ande thocht expedient be the commissaris of burrowis videlicet Edinburgis
Abirdene pertht Dunde hadington' that thar be direct ane scherp clerk and'
tua brges merchandis of fasson' to the archeduk of austrie et cetera with our souerane lordis
autentyve writtingis and parfit Instructionis of remed tueching the mater
of the lettrez of marque ande the dukis proclamacion' tueching the stapill gif
thar ony sic be
The personis diuisit to pas' at our souerane lordis Emplessur
ar thir videlicet for the mercheandis ser thomas tod provost of Edinburgh
ser Jonhne ruthirfurd' aldirman
of Aberdene'
ffor the clerkis m Master Dauid seton' parsone
of fethircarne
M gawan' Dunbar' dene
of murray failye of ony
vtheris siclik clerkis of
wisdome to be chosin in thar stedis

2 Item it is avisit ande thoch expedient be the saidez commissariis of
burrowis that devisit Ramed' may be had tueching the multitud of
sailaris videlicet that na man saile within 3 last of gude of his awine or
samekle' in sterage according to the act of parliament maid' tharapon' vndir
the pament of x li' as Is contenit in the saide act of parliament to be
rasit till our souerane lordis ws'

4 Item in likwis' that the act of parliament be obseruit ande kepit tueching
the craftismen videlicet that nane' of thame occupy merchandice and thar craft
to giddir sa that gif thai occupy the merchandice that thai leif thar craft and in
the contrair' eftir the forme of the saide act maid' tharapon' and the provest
and bailyheis within burgh' as sereffis in that part to reis' the brekaris of
thir actis and' to rais' the pane' of x' li' of the persone' brekand' ony
of thame als' oft as It happinnis tile our souerane lordis ws' and compt
tharof yer'ly to be gevin in the chekar

5 Item that na fre man within burgh' Colour ony vnfremannis gudis nor yet
na craftismennis gudis fre nor' vnfre within burgh' nor vteucht vndir
the pane' of x li' to be Rasit in likwis' tile our souerane lordis
ws' Ande compt tharapone' in likwis' to be gevin to the chekar yerlie

6 Item anentis chepman' and duellaris without burght that tappis and sellis
stapill gudis and merchandice that pertenis to the burgh' and gild tharof that at it
be forborn' in tyme' tocum and that na chapman pas' with sic stuff in gret to
wont in the Cuntre but als'mekle' as he maj beir one his bak
and that to be tappit in smallis vndir the pane of eschet

And that market be maid' of sic merchande gude nor' kepit be chepmen'
at kirkis bot withtin the kingis burrowis vndir the saide pain of
eschet and' at our souerane lordis lettrez be writtin to proclayme s thir forsaid'
Articulis at ale kirkis necessar herfor be sereffis to be diuisit be provest
ande baillieis within the kingis burrowis at the emplesur of his grace

It is avisit alsua and thocht expedient be the saides commissaris first
for our souerane lordis honour ande proffit of his Realme' and merchandis
tharof that na schip saile in merchandice to the portis of flandris holand'
nor' zeland' bot allanerly ij videlicet ser thomas toddis schip for the
having of the saidez personis direct fra our souerane lord' as said' Is
to the saide dux for the Intent abevin writtin The quhilk
schip tonagis salbe abandonit to my lord duk Archebischop of Sanct Androwis
for his finance to be maide and expedicion' of his materis befor ale
vthiris ffor the saidez commissariis vndirstandis that that and' ony may
schippis saile befor thar returning agane or at thaj send word'
for the expedicion' of thir materis and how thai ar passit thar
passage Is in wane the expensis tynt Ande tharthrow the inconstance
ande dishonour of the Realme to be delatit

Item It is consentit be the saidez commissaris that the Some' of iiijc
pundis be Rasit of the haile burrowis ande the merchandis and
tharof allanerlie and of nan' vtheris and this to be gadirit in continent
Ande tharof to be gevin for the expensis of the saide iij personis
that pass' and thar seruitouris iijc and lx li' for the space of iij
monetht Ande the tothir lx li' or alsmekle or alsmekile
as may be gottin tharof to be for the expensis and trawaile of
thame that gadiris in the samyn

And' ale thir fornemmyt Articlis to be formit ande
autorist be the kingis grace and as salbe thocht maist xpedient
be his hienis for his his honour and the common weile of his
Realme and' at his lettrez be autertely for the ingadiring of
the said' expensis of the said' burrowis as Is modeficat
be the saidez commissaris batht in the southt and northt

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xix die
mensis februarij quo Supra

The saide day Comperit ane Nobile and michtj lord Alexander lord gordon'
befor the aldirman and ballieis Sittand in Jugement within the tolbutht of
the samyn And thar' producit ane Act done befor the lordis of our Soueran
lordis Consale vndir the hand' and manuale subscription of Jonhne of
tiry as eftir follouis At Edinburghe the xxj day of Octobre the yer' of god
jM iiijC lxxxxv yeris In presens of the lordis of Consal it is appontit ande
accordit betuix Alexander lord gordone one that ane part and george eduardson'
burges of Edinburghe one the tothir part anent the withhalding fra the said george
of the Some of xxvj li' xvj s' vsual money of Scotland clamit be him to
be avand' be the said lord gordone for certane Salt bocht and resauit
be him fra the said george ande gilbert menyeis his factour In manere
ande forme as eftir follouis that is to say The saide Alexander lord gordoun'
sall preyff Sufficientlie befor the aldirman and balyeis of Abirdene or ellis
befor the lordis of Counsall in the next sessioun' that he bocht the said
Salt fra the said gilbert ande gaf him dettouris for the pament tharof
Ande falyeing of his said preyff the said Alexander lord gordone sal content
and pay the saide Some of xxvj li' and xvj s' to the said george be the
next cessioun' Extractum de libro Actorum per me Johannem tirj clericum deputatum
venerabili virj magistri Johannis fresale decanj de lestalrig Clericj Rotulorum et
Registrj ac Consilij Regij Suppremj domini nostri Regis sub meis Signorum
subscriptione manualibus John' tirj quhilkis Act being rede herd and vndirstandin
In presens of gilbert menyeis the said lord Reuerentlie Requirit the aldirman
and balyeis that thai walde caus' thir personis vndirwritin be Suorne the
gret aithez ande declar' the verite anent the bying of the saide Salt
eftir the tenour of the said act the quhilkis peticion the saide aldirman and balyeis
vndirstandand' resonabile and consonant to resone Resavit the personis vndirwritin
quhilkis riplie' auisit the gret aithez Suorne the saide gilbert nocht exceping'
agan thame deponit and declarit as eftir follouis' In the first
Alexander menyeis deponit be his aitht he hard say thar was salt sauld ande
deliuerit be gilbert menyeis to my lord gordone and he was nocht present at the
findin of the dettouris and he hard say thar was dettouris fundin sere John ruthirfurd deponit that
gilbert menyeis hed sauld to my lord gordon' and deliuerit to his factouris certan gret salt and
resavit Androw branche and thomas mar dettouris for the pament of the said salt and the saide
lord bocht na salt fra george Eduardsone' burges of Edinburgh' Androw culan eldar concordis
in ale thingis with the deposicion' of the saide sere John ruthirfurd' And atour saide that
gilbert menyeis gert summond' Androw branche and thomas mar befor our souerane lorde
for the pament of the saide salt Johnhe' colison deponit he hard say my lorde
gordone' bocht certan salt fra gilbert menyeis and as he trowis and Remembris Androw
branche and thomas mar was dettouris for the pament of the saide salt thomas
prat deponit he hard say lord gordon' bocht salt fra gilbert menyeis
and fand him dettouris for the pament of It thomas fyf concordis with
the saide thomas pratis deposicion' in ale thingis Robert blinsele deponit
he vndirstud gilbert menyeis had sauld certane sault to the lord gordone
and had resauit dettouris for the pament of the samyn Androw culan yongar
deponit he hard say lord gordone bocht certane salt fra gilbert menyeis
and the aldirman and bailyeis for the tyme was dettouris for the pament of the
samyn gilbert menyeis deponit be his aitht as he Remembris he sauld
to lord gordon' certane salt of george Eduardsonnis and Androw
branche Jonhne colison' thomas mar and Androw culan eldar come dettouris
to him for the pament of the saide salt bot he Remembris nocht the quantite
of the some' of the money to be resavit for the saide salt Ande Alexander
red deponit he hard say lord gordone bocht certan salt fra gilbert
menyeis and fand him dettour for the pament of the samyne

The said day the balyeis continevit the borghe' strekit one Robert
evinsone be Jonhne mar' procurator to John blabir' for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of tua petj quartaris of Salt quhil monunday
that next cumis for waknes of the court in siclik strintht as It is
now but preiudice til ony partj

Jacobus dei gracia Rex scotorum omnibus probis hominibus suis ad quos presentes littere
peruenerint Salutem Sciatis quod Intelleximus quod burgenses et mercatores burgi
nostri de Abirdene quod magna dampna et Incommoda hactenus perpessi sunt ob
exportacionem lane pellium et corriorum extra vicecomitum nostrum de Abirdene' Incon
trarum priuilegiorum et libertatis dictorum burgensuum burgensium in fraude in nostre magne
custume dicti burgi Nos Igitur accenden accenden' et perpenden' infrictionem
dicte libertatis et huiusmodi dampna nostra et dictorum nostrorum burgensuum burgensium commisimus
et tenore presencium committimus Preposito balliuis et burgensibus dicti nostri
quj pro tempore fueruit eorumque deputatis liberam facultatem et plenariam
presentatem eschaetand' et ad vsum nostrum approbriandum et capiendum huiusmodi bona
lanas pelles Corria Sic extra dictum vicecomitum et libertatem dicti burgi
abducta seu Impostrum forsitan' abducenda absque solucione nostre custume
de quibusquidam bonis eschaetatis concessimus et tenore presencium concedimus
dictis preposito balliuis et burgensibus burgi nostri de Abirdene dimidietatem
eschaete eorundem pro eorum laboribus sumptibus et expensis faciendis certa
eorum eschaetacionem Aliam vero dimidietatem dicte eschaete ad nos Impor
tare et de eisdem bonis annuatim' nostro Scaccario computum reddere tenebuntur
prepositj et ballivi burgi supradicti prout littere potestatis quondam carissimj et nobilisimj
aui nostri dictis preposito balliuis et burgensibus prius desuper confectis in se plenius
proportauit et testantur Quare Vniuersis et Singulis liegis et subditis
nostris quorum Interest vel Interesse poterit stricte precipiendo mandamus
contentus dictis preposito balliuis et burgensibus dicti burgi eorumque deputatis
ministris et seruitoribus in omnibus et singulis eschaetacionem dictorum bonorum concernen'
et deportacionem eorundem ad vsus nostros vt premittitur prompte Respondeant
pareant et Intendant Et quod Incontrarium presencium nullatenus deuenire
presumant temporibus pro futuris Sub omni pena quam ergam nostram Regiam
Incurrere poteruit maiestatem presentibus pro nostra voluntate et deinde vsque
ad nostram specialem Reuocacionem earundem durature datum sub magno
Sigillo nostro apud abirbrothoc vndecimo die mensis Decembris Anno
Domini millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo quinto et Regnj nostri Octauo
Littera facta preposito balliuis et burgensibus
burgj de Aberdene et cetera et cetera

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxij
de mensis februarij quo supra

The saide day Williame colp comperit and schew for gude of the merchandis
that he hed gevin to the franche Schip now beand' in the port
and havin of Abirdene callit the cristofer of Deipe Coket In doubile
forme tharfor he protestit it suld' turne him to nay preiudice nor
Skath

the saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit this day xv dais
to Symon gardin to ansuer to the borghe Strekit one him be
William blinsele for the wranguis' haldin fra him of fiwe dakir
tua les' of hidis quhilkis he suld' haue deliuerit to Copin lavris
seruitour to vmquhile Copin lavaris portar of brugis and tuk one him
to preywe that the said copin hed resavit the said hidis and the said Symon was
requirit tharto and refusit the Samyn

Eodem die Andreas litstar amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore Willelmi blinsell
prelocutoris assise pro perturbio Johannis Kirkland' Cuj emendabit ut Jura
volunt pro qua emenda Soluet dicto Johanni v s' fabrice operis
v s' ij li' cere ad lumen Sancti Sanguinis et si perturbium in postrum
alicui commiserit et de hoc conuictus summonuit soluet xx s' ad fabricam ecclesiam
et restaurabit birretum et pilium

the s
the saide day patrik leslie grantit to pay to Alexander horne xiiij
s' within xv dais for normond' leslie

The saide day Waltir atkin was conuikit be ane assis' William
blinsele forspekar for dissobeying of henry orvm offciar in the execucion'
of his office et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiij die
februarij quo Supra

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' William
blinsel forspekar that patrik leslie Sale ansuer to Alexander chamer for x s'
gret for Ilkan of his tua barrelis of girls at the first bying
and that fraucht and vncost being allouit tharintile siclik as
vthiris pais of that rais'

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Williame
blinsele forspekar that Alexander couper in the schipraw sale vpmak
the yard that he pertenis to sere Jonhne stirueling chaplane of Sanct
Jonhnez alter lyande besid Sanct Katherinez hile as gud as
It was quhene he Intromittit with It

The saide day Robert evinsone lauchfullie warnit callit ande
nocht comperit to ansuer to the borgh' strekit one him be Jonhne
mar procurator to John blabir for the wrangvis' haldin of tua petj
quarteris of salt et cetera tharfor the bailyeis chargit Androw nachtj sergeand' to pas
and tak ane stres' of the saide Robert and lat it to borgh' gif it
be askit ande warne him to this day fiftene as secund day
of proces' befor sufficient witnes

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxv die februarij
quo supra

The saide day Alexander Rede forspekar for Alexander mathesone producit ane
bill writin with Jonhne Damaris hande to the said Alexander mathesone sayand'
and makand mencion ye sal resaue god willing out of Willekinnis schip
a petj quartar of Salt and out of A Neilboltar schip j petj quartar of Salt
and offerit him to preywe Sufficientlie the said bill leile and trew
als' Sone as Certificacion may Cum in the Erast Schippez et cetera

James be the grace king of scottis to our seref of Abirdene and his deputis and to the aldirman
and balyeis of our burgh of Abirdene greting forasmekle' as we ar sickirlie aduertist
and Informit that the fredome and preuilege of our saide burgh Abirdene and burges of the samyn
ar gretlie preiudicat and skathit be thar nichtbouris and conburges duelland' to lande without
be burgh' quhilkis haldis apone bothis selling and biing ale maner of merchandice
wole hiddis and skynnis and cumis nocht to our saide burgh' abstrakande thame fra pament
of our taxtis to that Intent that the officiaris to burgh' sale nocht destrenyer thame to landwart
for our dewiteis and taxtis Ande als be forstallaris at ilk parroch kirk quhilk sellis and
byis ale maner of merchandice nocht suffering our liegis to cum to our saide burgh' and
market tharof for pament of thar dewites in gret preiudice of vs and our saide burgh'
Ande elikwis' be fleschouris listaris cordineris vsing and excercing thar awine
craftis and ale vthir maner of merchandice expres' contrar the actis and statutis of our
Realme gif it sa be Ande elikwis' be vnlefule nychtbouris and personis within burgh'
Nychtwalcaris pikaris Rebellouris brekaris of commone ordinance ande statutis in
gret preiudice and skath to ws and incontrar the vniuersale weile of our burgh' and in bre
king and violacion' of actis and statutis of parliament and in contrar equite and iustice gif
it sabe Our Wile is her'for and we charg youe stratlie and commandis that ye in continent thir
our lettrez sene but delay pas' be opyn' proclamacion' and warning at the market cors'
of our saide burgh' and vthir placis nedfule quhar it efferis command warne'
and charg ale nychtbouris and burges of Abirdene' occupying merchandice that thaj within
tuenty dais next eftir your proclamacion and warning cum and duell within our saide
burgh' of Abirdene and to desist and ceis' fra ale occupacion' of merchandice without
the burgh' Ande that nay maner of personis quhat estat or degre thaj be of
excers' or ws' vteuche the fredome of our saide burgh ony maner of merchandice
bot within the samyne as saide vndir the pane of escheting of ale thar gudis
movabile Ande that nay maner of craftismen excers' nor' ws' nay maner of merchandice
within burgh' bot his awine craft vthir wais thane thaj ar levit be the law
vndir the panis forsaide Ande atour that ye seik and sercht be Inquisicion and vthir wais
eftir the consuetud and wse of burrowis ale vnlauchfule personis sic as
nychtwalcaris Jukaris Rebellouris brekaris of commone ordinance ande statutis
Ande quhaj beis conuikit tharintile be ane assis' that ye puinys thame eftir
the quantite of thar trespas according to the lawis of the burgh as said
Is Ande this one naywis' ye leif vndone' vndir ale pane' and charge
that eftir may folloue The quhilk to do we committ to ye coniunctlie and seueralie
our fule power' be thir our lettrez kepand' the samyn for your warande gevin
vndir our priuie Seile at Stirueling the xxv day of Nouember'
Ande of Regne the aucht yer'

the saide day Androw nachtj sergeande grantit that he at command'
of the baillies gert pris' ane gray hors' for x s' pertening to Johne
Dauisone in taruas to the pament of his dettis

the said day george bisset oblist him to thomas prat and Androw
branche in the name of the lawe of the merchantis to pay tham
j petj quartar of Salt fre in Abirdene at the hame cumin of the next
Schippis And' Alexander matheson' oblist him to pay j petj quartar
of Salt to the said george in Abirdene at the hame cumin of the next
Schippis gif Jonhne Damar' has nocht pait the petj quartar of Salt
that the said Alexander has resavit at this rais' out of Neilbollar schip

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvjo die
februarij quo Supra

head.add: carnifices tinctores Scissoris et artifices vten' binis artibus

div.p:
Eodem die Jacobus Kennartj senior Jacobus Kennartj Junior cristoferus
prat et Alexander prat Scissores et carnifices posuerunt se In voluntate
prepositi et burgi pro occupacione artis proprie et mercancie

Eodem die Willelmus lammyntone carnifex posuit se in voluntate
prepositj et burgi pro occupacione artis proprie et mercancie

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo die februarij
quo Supra

The said day Jonhne blak follouit geoge brone ane borghe'
for the wranguis' haldin fra him of iiijor markis with the mar' to
to compt' and rekning Ande the said george allegit he hed pait to
the saide Jonhne vj stane of woll and xj s' of Siluer of the said some
and askit ane lauchful day to his preiwe and the balyeis assignit him this
day xv dais to preiwe his said allegeance befor thame

the saide day gilbert menyeis oblist him be his hande landis
ande gudis to warand defend ande keip the aldirman balyeis
ande officiaris of this burghe Skathtles of the half nethis fisching'
of the furdis debatabile betuix Dauid menyeis and Androw murray
for this Instant yer' and the aldirman ordanit thome menyeis to fische
the said fisching In the kingis namez his and the balyeis

the said day the aldirman at commavnd of the Consale resavit
fra Jonhne of tulibo xxix s' Scottis money for the vnlavis
and Amerciamentis committit be Jonhne richerdsone in fordis' for forstalling
of the burghe'

The saide day the balieis assignit monunday that next cumis to
androw cristesone to ansuer' perempturlie with consent of batht the partiis
to the borghe' strekit one him be Jonhne mar' procurator to Johne
blabir' for the wranguis' haldin fra him of the price of j quart
petj quartar of Salt

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quarto die
mensis marcij anno Domini et cetera nonagesimo quinto

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' patrik
leslie forspekar that thomas beg is avand' to Dauid Kintor yongar
x s' Scottis

Eodem die Andreas murray Inuenit Willelmum futhes et Willelmum murray
plegios legales quod thomas menyeis erit Indempnis erit pro eo Dauid
murray Roberto murray et Johanne murray aliter quam per viam Juris
Et Willelmus Kyntor deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Andreas Dauid
Robertus et Johannes erunt Indempnes pro dicto thoma aliter quam per viam
Juris Et quilibet parcium obligatur ad releuandum et conseruandum plegium Indemp
nes de huiusmodi fideiussione et cetera

the saide day the aldirman at command' of the kingis lettres chargit
Androw murray and the procuratoris of Dauid menyeis to decist fra the fischingis
of ane demi nethis of the furdis debatabile betuix tham and ordanit thome
menyeis to fische the said half nethis and keip the fische in evin handis

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Septimo
die mensis marcij

the said day Adam Ruthirfurd Inquerit at thom Waus gif he
hed ony thingis to say to him ande he said he hed nay thing
to say to him bot gif he hed ony thing to say to him

the said day Dauid Kintor grantit him aving to Jonhne retre v s'
for his Cobill hir' to be pait within terme of law

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis with avis' of the consal
assignit this day xv dais to Alexander prat and Androw hall to ansuer'
perempturlie to Androw lyntone for the ayrschipe of vmquhile
William lintone his eme safar' as cane be fundin he deit
possessit with

The saide day the bailyheis assignit this day fiftene dais
to Symon gardin to ansuer to the borgh' strekit one him be
Williame for the wrangwise halding fra him of v dakir
of hiddis tua les' as he that cled the tour and denyit the s with
halding of the samyne

the said day Anny tulideff grantit scho hed to Duncan portar the
forland that he now Inhabitis on friday was viij dais for say
lang as scho has the Sett of It and he ples' to remane in
It

The said day Anny Waus grantit scho hed erllis tua houris
in hir' handis of Adam of Cullannis for the forland that Duncane
portar now Inhabitis Sene scho sett It to the said Duncane

The said day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' that Androw
cristesone sall ger lay half ane petj quartar of Salt in the
next schipe cumand out of flandris to the profit of Jonhne
mar procurator to Johne blabir the said Johne berand the aventour
and payand' the fraucht

the said day henrik orvm Androw nachtj and James leis deponit
the gret aithe that thai bystude herd saw and for witnes was
tane quhen philp Dunbrek officiar' warnit Androw murray eldar
personalie apprehendit this last Sonday to comper him self bringand
with him his complicis beand at the strekin of the demi nethis of the
furdis atour the commaund of the aldirman and balyeis eftir the tenour of
our Souerane lordis lettres to ansuer to the aldirman and balyeis and
to thomas menyeis for strubulance et cetera And the said Androw lauchfullie
callit and nocht comperit the aldirman and balyeis ordanit the said philp
to pas' and tak ane streis of the said Androwis and latt It to borghe'
and It be askit and warne him to Comper to morne befor them
to ansuer apone the premiss'

The saide day James othir Othirburne seruand to Androw murray
eldar was conuikit for dissobeing of Androw nachtj officiar'

The saide day it was deliuerit be the aldirman and the consale that
ane bailye and ane officiar suld pas' to the relict' of Richerd Kintor
ande charge hir in the kingis nayme and tharis to pay the malis
of the forland that scho Inhabitis pertening to margaret Kintor and marion'
Kintor' ayris tile vmquhile Richard Kintor of the termes bigane
ande to red the lande to thame or ellis tak it at thame and
charge hir to revins' and to taxt tua s' and j d' of maile Ilk
day that scho occupyis the saide lande frathinfurthe

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
Octauo die mensis marcij quo supra

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem ix die mensis
marcij quo Supra

Eodem die Dauid murray conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore
Johannis Colisone prelocutorem eiusdem pro perturbio thome menyeis Cuj emen
dabit ut Jura volunt et Idem thomas amerciatur pro perturbio dicti Andree
Andree murray cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt
